text.div:
HSPC Head Circumference Units of Measure Value Set

The list of codes used for the units of measure for head circumference.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from UCUM. Implementer use of UCUM is not covered by this agreement

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://unitsofmeasure.org
    CodeDisplay
    cmCentiMeter [SI Length Units]
    [in_us]Inch [length]

name: HSPC Head Circumference Units of Measure Value Set
description: The list of codes used for the units of measure for head circumference.
